overview: August and Sybil share everything, including every detail of their sex lives. So when August complains that her husband hasn't been fucking her, Sybil offers up her own husband to show August a good time.  Peta Jensen is convinced her husband, Bill Bailey, has been cheating on her. She decides to hire an escort, Jessa Rhodes, with plenty of experience in cheating husbands. Nicole Aniston has discovered that her husband, Charles Dera, has been cheating on her with his sexy mistress, Audrey Bitoni. Instead of getting mad, Nicole decides to get even by catching them in the act!  Cassidy Klein, a homeless runaway tramp, has been offered some shelter in the home of Bill Bailey. Much to the chagrin of his loving wife, Chanel Preston.
title: Double Timing Wives
